job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for an innovative software engineer to help us build the futureppbrppThis position willpp Create new features and fix bugspp Collaborate with the product owner and other developerspp Operate with minimal oversight to develop code the matches provided requirementsppbrppThe preferred candidate haspp Desire to contribute energy to building great technology solutionspp Entrepreneurial collaborative spirit needed to work in a distributed startup culturepp Practical experience designing scalable applications for web andor mobilepp Effective verbal written communication skillspp Experience with Angular Node and MongoDB requiredppbrppThis is not an entrylevel position  you need to be able to hit the ground runningppHowever capabilities are far more important than credentialsppbrppThis is a fulltime W2 100 remote positionppCandidates in Florida Ohio or Utah are preferredppPrivate Auto LLC offers employees medical and dental insuranceppCandidates must be legally authorized to work in the US No visa sponsorshipsp
